title: Bilgewater event - Graves and Twisted Fate
body: Happy to see Bilgewater alive, full of criminals and my favorite champions are back! {{champion:4}} {{champion:104}}

replies.body: Graves looks so thoughtful and melancholic - is he feeling ok?  Twisted Fate looking appropriately sly, however - good job.

Oh my gosh thank you so much. I am glad you liked it, these two are like my favorite champs and I am really excited for the event. I think they have a lot of character, so I wanted to show that. But to be honest I can see Graves being rather thoughtful and bitter when TF is looking like that haha.
